item.title: (Nov. 27 - Dec. 3) Suspension DDBJ services due to NIG Supercomputer maintenace
item.description: NIG Supercomputer will be unavailable due to scheduled maintenance on the following schedule.November 27(Fri) 17:00 - December 3 (Thu) 24:00 (JST)DDBJ services will also be unavailable.We will announce on this page and Twitter when the schedule is fixed.We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause you.

item.title: (November 26 - December 3) Suspension of DDBJ services due to NIG Supercomputer maintenance
item.description: Due to NIG Supercomputer maintenance, submission, search and analysis services of DDBJ Center will be unavailable on the following schedule.ServicesSchedule (JST)・DDBJ Nucleotide Sequence Submission SystemNovember 25(Wed) 18:00 ～ December 4(Fri) 18:00(JST) ・DRA validation・GEA validationNovember 26(Thr) 14:00 ～ December 4(Fri) 12:00(JST)・D-way・DRA Search・BioProject Search・BioSample Search・GEA reviewer access・NBDC Application System・AGD Submission/Download Tool・AGD Meta Viewer・AgdRestNovember 27(Fri) 13:00 ～ December 3(Thr) 24:00(JST)・NIG Supercomputer・DDBJ FTP Service・getentry・ARSA・BLAST・ClustalWNovember 27(Fri) 17:00 ～ December 3(Thr) 24:00(JST)Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.

item.title: Our activity report was published in Nucleic Acids Research Database Issue
item.description:
Our last year's activities focusing on recent JGA system enhancements was published in Nucleic Acids Research Database Issue.
DDBJ update: streamlining submission and access of human data Fukuda A, Kodama Y, Mashima J, Fujisawa T, Ogasawara O
Nucleic Acids Research 2020 Pubmed: 33156332 doi: 10.1093/nar/gkaa982
Topics
Statistics of the public databases The JGA system enhancements including its integration with the NBDC application system Submission automation
